data.name: Just Cause™ 3 DLC: Bavarium Sea Heist Pack
data.detailed_description:
Just Cause 3: Bavarium Sea Heist is the third PDLC pack from the Air, Land & Sea Expansion pass. With your devastating new rocket boat, brave the dangerous waters of West Medici and infiltrate the Stingray, a mysterious research facility, home of the rarest and strongest weapon ever created by the Eden Corporation.

This content pack includes a brand new location to explore, missions, challenge type, the heavily armed rocket boat and the devastating “Eden Spark” lighting gun.

KEY FEATURES
  • Liberate the Medici coastal waters of Scolio, home to Eden Research stations and the mysterious “Stingray” base.
  • Drive the deadly rocket boat “Loochador”, using its multi-lock missile launchers and miniguns to defeat the formidable Black Hand Fleet.
  • Infiltrate the Stingray base to steal the devastating “Eden Spark” lightning gun and unleash elemental death on your enemies in all new storyline and missions.
  • Power up the Eden Spark further with mods earned in the “Boat Invader” challenge.

data.short_description: Just Cause 3: Bavarium Sea Heist is the third PDLC pack from the Air, Land & Sea Expansion pass.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: Vista SP2 / Windows 7.1 SP1 / Windows 8.1 (64-bit Operating System Required)
  • 处理器: Intel Core i5-2500k, 3.3GHz / AMD Phenom II X6 1075T 3GHz
  • 内存: 8 GB RAM
  • 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (2GB) / AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB)
  • 存储空间: 需要 54 GB 可用空间
pc_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 操作系统: Vista SP2 / Windows 7.1 SP1 / Windows 8.1 (64-bit Operating System Required)
  • 处理器: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz / AMD FX-8350, 4.0 GHz
  • 内存: 8 GB RAM
  • 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 (3GB) / AMD R9 290 (4GB)
  • 存储空间: 需要 54 GB 可用空间
